M

MainMenuScreen - Class in com.cosmicraiders
This is the screen that is displayed when the game starts and between rounds.
MainMenuScreen(CosmicRaiders) - Constructor for class com.cosmicraiders.MainMenuScreen
Constructs the main menu screen which is the first thing the player sees.
moveAlienLasers() - Method in class com.cosmicraiders.MovementHandler
Moves alien lasers downwards and deletes them when they leave the screen.
moveAliens() - Method in class com.cosmicraiders.MovementHandler
Moves aliens from side to side, with a random factor for changing direction.
moveAsteroids() - Method in class com.cosmicraiders.MovementHandler
Moves Asteroids downwards and deletes them when they leave the screen.
moveFighterLasers() - Method in class com.cosmicraiders.MovementHandler
Moves fighter lasers upwards and deletes them when they leave the screen.
MovementHandler - Class in com.cosmicraiders
This class handles all movement for aliens, asteroids and lasers.
MovementHandler(GameScreen) - Constructor for class com.cosmicraiders.MovementHandler
This constructor gets a reference to the GameScreen instance.
movePowerUps() - Method in class com.cosmicraiders.MovementHandler
